docs.title: Text Counter Application using Scala.js and Laminar
docs.text: This is a text counter application using Scala.js project and Laminar library.

docs.title: Scala.js App
docs.text:
git clone https://github.com/lulunac27a/text-counter-scala-js-application.git
cd text-counter-scala-js-application
cd scala-js
sbt fastLinkJS
npm run dev

docs.title: Laminar
docs.text:
git clone https://github.com/lulunac27a/text-counter-scala-js-application.git
cd text-counter-scala-js-application
cd laminar
sbt fastLinkJS
npm run dev
